text.p: Write a Python function, evalQuadratic(a, b, c, x), that returns the value of the quadratic [mathjaxinline]a\cdot x^2 + b\cdot x + c[/mathjaxinline].
This function takes in four numbers and returns a single number.

codeparam.initial_display: def evalQuadratic(a, b, c, x): ''' a, b, c: numerical values for the coefficients of a quadratic equation x: numerical value at which to evaluate the quadratic. ''' # Your code here
codeparam.answer_display: def evalQuadratic(a, b, c, x): ''' a, b, c: numerical values for the coefficients of a quadratic equation x: numerical value at which to evaluate the quadratic. ''' return a*x*x + b*x + c
